title: SANDERS, WARREN, & the Ideological Future of the Left
itunes:author: Toby Buckle
itunes:summary: What enabled the Sanders campaign to attract the support that it did? I consider this question using a variety of analytic frameworks. I also consider the differences/ dividing lines between Sanders & Warren & end looking at the future challenges & opportunities for left-wing ideologies.
